Food-themed decor has been having a moment for the last few years — from martini olive pillows to fun fruity accent pieces. Aldi is now leaning into this trend, too, with an adorable $8 strawberry-themed wax warmer for sale that’s perfect for welcoming spring into your home. Wax warmers (not to be confused with candle warmers) allow you to melt scented wax on them, so your room can be filled with the fragrance of your choice. 

“OMG seriously I could not stop looking at everything in the Finds aisle this week lol,” Sarah from Aldi All The Time on Instagram wrote in a recent video caption, adding in the video, “They have these fruit wax warmers that were really cute. Perfect for spring.”

Cute might be an understatement — this is one of the sweetest food-themed home items I’ve seen. Aldi has been dropping wax warmers almost every season, and this is hands down my favorite so far. 

The Kirkton House Fruit Wax Warmer is super easy to use. Just plug it in and turn the dial switch on to warm up the base. Add your scented wax cubes of choice to the green plate and watch them melt into a fragrant liquid that will make your space smell as heavenly as you desire. Then, just turn the warmer off when you’re done and wait for the wax to reharden. You can swap out that disc for another scent or reheat to release the same one. 

This wax warmer is great because there’s no open flame required, making it a safe option for fragrance lovers who don’t trust themselves to blow out their candles before leaving the house. The warmer also doesn’t emit any smoke like candles do, making this a cleaner option than scented candles.

Pick up this cute little wax warmer from Aldi today or grab it online through Instacart while it’s still available. You’re going to want to get one before they go viral and become nearly impossible to find!
